backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no defined methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI updates referencing 'Yono Store' and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend file's purpose and content.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting the document title to 'Yono Store' and loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component managing navigation, theming, and page rendering.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with Yono Store branding, links, legal info, and responsible gaming notices.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component with branding, navigation, search, and Internet Identity login controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and updating a backend actor instance based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication hook and provider managing Internet Identity login, logout, and state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching listings, promo codes, news, complaints, and dashboard stats, all currently wired to placeholder logic. Includes a mutation hook for submitting complaints with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, applying them globally. Sets default border, background, and text utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider. Renders the main App component and imports global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminComplaints.tsx: Renders an admin interface for viewing, responding to, and approving or rejecting mock complaints. Uses cards, badges, and actions with toast feedback.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Displays the admin dashboard with navigation, stats, and sidebar behavior. Requires Internet Identity login and lets admins navigate to management pages.
frontend/src/pages/AdminListings.tsx: Shows a table of mock casino listings with edit/delete actions and status badges. Includes navigation and an option to add new listings.
frontend/src/pages/AdminNews.tsx: Lists mock news articles with metadata, tags, and edit/delete controls. Provides navigation and an action to add new articles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPromoCodes.tsx: Displays mock promo codes with expiration dates and actions for editing or deleting. Includes navigation and a button to add new promo codes.
frontend/src/pages/BonusesPage.tsx: Displays a list of mock bonus offers with countdown timers and copy-to-clipboard functionality.
frontend/src/pages/CasinoDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed casino info including rating, description, pros/cons, reviews, and tabbed sections.
frontend/src/pages/CasinosPage.tsx: Renders a searchable, filterable, and sortable grid of mock casino listings.
frontend/src/pages/ComplaintsPage.tsx: Provides a complaint submission form and displays a list of mock complaint cases.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Presents the homepage with hero section and recommended casino listings.
frontend/src/pages/NewsDetailPage.tsx: Displays a detailed news article with tags, metadata, image, and rich HTML content.
frontend/src/pages/NewsPage.tsx: React page rendering a featured news article and grid of mock news items with navigation to detail pages.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling custom colors, typography, animations, and container queries with theme extensions.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the siteâ€™s goals, architecture, issues, and existing implemented features.
